questions:
According to Marcus Cicero, what triggers his brother's arrival? Give the Latin text.
*maximam laetitiam / laetitiam maximam*

Cicero attributes two positive functions to his brother Quintus, which explain why Quintus is popular. Name the Latin words in the series of occurrences.
*custodem / custos* and *hospitem / hospes*
text:
Esse, quocumque veneris, et publice et privatim maximam laetitiam, cum urbs custodem non tyrannum, domus hospitem non expilatorem recepisse videatur?


Or that wherever you go, both in public and in private homes, the highest happiness breaks out, because it turns out that the city has taken in a guard and not a tyrant, the private house a guest and not a robber?

confirmCheck.body: Are you sure you wish to finish ?
